section.heading: Leave required to be taken pending review of certain court-martial convictions

content.p:
ยง 130.72-c. Leave required to be taken pending review of certain
court-martial convictions. Under regulations prescribed by the adjutant
general, an accused who has been sentenced by a court-martial will be
carried in a leave status and will not participate in any training
pending completion of action under this chapter if the sentence, as
approved under section 130.60 of this article, includes an unsuspended
dismissal or an unsuspended dishonorable or bad-conduct discharge. The
accused may be required to begin such leave on the date on which the
sentence is approved under section 130.60 of this article or at any time
after such date, and such leave may be continued until the date on which
action under this chapter is completed or may be terminated at any
earlier time.
